title: Implement Core Performance Metrics Collection
description: Deploy a comprehensive metrics collection system to monitor component performance, request latency, error rates, and resource utilization in real-time
implementation_steps: Install and configure metrics collection library (e.g., Prometheus client or StatsD)
Instrument key functions with timing metrics
Add counters for successful/failed operations
Implement gauge metrics for active connections and queue sizes
Create histogram metrics for response time distributions

title: Create Real-time Metrics Dashboard
description: Build a visualization dashboard to display collected metrics with alerts for anomaly detection and threshold breaches
implementation_steps: Set up Grafana or similar dashboard tool
Create panels for key performance indicators
Configure alert rules for critical thresholds
Implement automated alerting via email/Slack
Add drill-down capabilities for detailed analysis

title: Implement Distributed Tracing
description: Add distributed tracing capabilities to track requests across service boundaries and identify bottlenecks in the request flow
implementation_steps: Integrate OpenTelemetry or Jaeger SDK
Add trace context propagation to all service calls
Instrument database queries with span tags
Configure sampling strategy for production
Set up trace storage and retention policies

title: Add Custom Business Metrics
description: Track application-specific metrics that align with business objectives and user behavior patterns
implementation_steps: Identify key business events to track
Implement custom metric collectors
Add user journey tracking metrics
Create funnel analysis capabilities
Set up cohort analysis for user segments

title: Establish Performance Baseline and SLOs
description: Define and monitor Service Level Objectives based on collected metrics to ensure consistent performance and reliability
implementation_steps: Analyze historical performance data (once collected)
Define SLI metrics (availability, latency, error rate)
Set realistic SLO targets based on user requirements
Implement error budget tracking
Create automated reports for SLO compliance
